#summary There's a lot more than Java 5 language support!

= New Features in GWT 1.5 =

==== Support for Java 5 ====
At long last, GWT support the modern Java 5 syntax, including
  * Generics
  * Enumerated types
  * Annotations
  * Enhanced for-loop syntax
  * Static imports

Taking full advantage of generics and annotations will require some changes in your code, as described in [ReleastNotes_1_5_ImportantNotes].
